remarks: Translate the function compatibility relation to a quotient set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ercpbl.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
ercpbl.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) $.
ercpbl.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
ercpbl.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) ) -> ( a .+ b ) e. V ) $.
ercpbl.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( A .~ C /\ B .~ D ) -> ( A .+ B ) .~ ( C .+ D ) ) ) $.
ercpbl $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ ( C e. V /\ D e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` A ) = ( F ` C ) /\ ( F ` B ) = ( F ` D ) ) -> ( F ` ( A .+ B ) ) = ( F ` ( C .+ D ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ a b x $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A a b x $.
$d B b x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d V a b x $.
$d a b ph x $.
